fields.description: The time interval in hours to take snapshots (restore points) of a Cloud PC automatically. Possible values are: default, fourHours, sixHours, twelveHours, sixteenHours, twentyFourHours, unknownFutureValue. The default value is default that indicates that the time interval for automatic capturing of restore point snapshots is set to 12 hours.
fields.name: FrequencyType

fields.description: The OData ID of this entity
fields.name: ODataId

fields.description: The OData Type of this entity
fields.name: ODataType

fields.description: If true, the user has the ability to use snapshots to restore Cloud PCs. If false, non-admin users can't use snapshots to restore the Cloud PC.
fields.name: UserRestoreEnabled
